query:
select
            url,
            title,
            created_at,
            tags_string
        from bookmark_with_tags bwt
        where
            user_id = ?
            and is_archived = 0
            and (
                instr(title, ?) > 0
                or instr(description, ?) > 0
                or instr(url, ?) > 0
                or exists (
                    select 1 from bookmark_tags bt
                    join tags t on bt.tag_id = t.tag_id
                    where
                        bt.bookmark_id = bwt.bookmark_id
                        and instr(t.name, ?) > 0
                )
            )
        order by created_at desc
        limit ? offset ?
